issue.title: [C++] Incorrect variable name ARROW_CXX_FLAGS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9256](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9256). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A flag ARROW_CXX_FLAGS declared here
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/CMakeLists.txt#L475
seems to be a typo of ARROW_CXXFLAGS
